titleStmt.title: Militarie instructions for the cavallrie: or Rules and directions for the service of horse collected out of divers forrain authors ancient and modern, and rectified and supplied, according to the present practise of the Low-Countrey warres.
titleStmt.author: Cruso, John, d. 1681.

titleStmt.title: Militarie instructions for the cavallrie: or Rules and directions for the service of horse collected out of divers forrain authors ancient and modern, and rectified and supplied, according to the present practise of the Low-Countrey warres.
titleStmt.author: Cruso, John, d. 1681.
Dalen, Cornelius van, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Universitie of Cambridge [[i.e. Thomas Buck and Roger Daniel] and are to besold [sic] by Ni: Alsope at the Angell in Popes Head Alley [, London]],

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed "C. V. Dalen. sculpsit", with imprint "Printed by the printers to the Vniversity of Cambridge: and are to besold [sic] by Ni: Alsope at the Angell in Popes Head Alley" in cartouche at foot. Variant: engraved title page lacks imprint and engraver's signature.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the printers to the Universitie of Cambridge [[i.e. Thomas Buck
